top_categories.workout_context: Spring Valley 100's Minnesota rolling gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Spring Valley 100. Train it until it feels boring.
At mile 60 of 100, glycogen is gone. This workout teaches your body to produce watts on fumes.
At Spring Valley 100, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
Spring Valley 100's Minnesota rolling, Local event forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 100 miles.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 100 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.
100 miles rewards fat oxidation. This volume work shifts your fuel mix so you're still burning fat at hour 5, not bonking at hour 3.
Two threshold sessions per week without the recovery cost of VO2max work. For 100 miles, sustainable FTP gains matter more than peak power.
Varied gradients on Minnesota rolling gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Spring Valley 100's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before May.
Tempo is Spring Valley 100's race pace. The wattage you'll hold for 100 miles on Minnesota rolling gravel. Train it until it's automatic.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 4,000ft of climbing on Minnesota rolling gravel does to your power file on race day.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Spring Valley 100’s 100 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Spring Valley 100 requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on minnesota rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: minnesota rolling, local event, midwest gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, G Spot, and Durability to prepare you for 100 miles of minnesota rolling gravel in Spring Valley, Minnesota.
